full_summary:
# Business Process Consultant - In-Support for VIVSS II

## Tender Details
* **Tender Name**: VIVSS II Business Process Consultant
* **Tender Reference Number**: W8482-241721/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-23T14:00:00 (Expired)

## Brief Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Business Process Consultant to provide support for VIVSS II. This procurement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under "Tier 1" for the category 2.5 Senior (Level 3) Business Process Consultant.

## Services Requirements

The Consultant will provide consulting services and task deliverables as outlined in the task description and deliverable sections. The scope of work includes:

* Providing business process analysis and improvement services
* Developing and implementing business process improvement plans
* Providing training and support to DND end-users

## Security Requirements
* Company Minimum Security Level Required: SECRET
* Resource Minimum Security Level Required: SECRET
* Document Safeguarding Security Level Required: PROTECTED

## Contract Details
* **Duration**: 480 days (initial contract period) + 240 days (option period)
* **Option Period**: 1 year from 01 April 2025 to 31 March 2026
* **Estimated Level of Effort**: see contract documentation for details
* **Holds Applicable Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others.

## Associated Documents
The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who have been invited to bid on this requirement. Please note that the RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Laura Sample
* **Contact Email**: DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca
* **Note**: The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**End of Entry**
